fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot someone during the day with a poison dart gun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only shoot twice.
- You fire so fast, nobody will know it was you who shot your target. However, everyone will know who has been shot and when.
- Players you shoot will die after two nights of being poisoned. They can only be saved by natural defense (no healing etc).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take down the Town through various crimes.
